artifacts.summary: Comprehensive audit of Metalogic organization with sorry analysis and architecture recommendations

partial_progress.details: Complete audit of 41 Metalogic files, identified 35 sorries across 9 files, created ASCII flowcharts showing current and ideal organization

recommendations: Keep FMP/Semantic path as primary completeness approach
Archive Representation path as research-grade artifact
Document architectural gap in box case (S5 semantics limitation)
Move obsolete files (old IndexedMCS, single-MCS CanonicalHistory) to Boneyard
